data.text: RT @ManUtd: Happy birthday Sir Bobby Charlton. The United legend and club director is 76 today. http://t.co/TIUiKiXVg5 #mufc

Man Utd and @SwansOfficial have met 20 times. The first was way back during the 1931-32 season! 9 wins for #MUFC, 5 losses and 6 draws.

It's 2 days and 5 hours until the 2013/14 @premierleague season starts.

RT if you're looking forward to it as much as us!

Zaha to the rescue with a simple finish and it's game over in Japan. 2-2 draw, a fair result #topflightperformance
Goal! 2-1 to the hosts, a really great finish #topflightperformance
Kagawa scores for #MUFC! Well deserved goal soon after the penalty miss. 1-1 in Japan #topflightperformance
At half time Cerezo Osaka lead @ManUtd 1-0. #mufc #topflightperformance
Fan favourite Kagawa is playing some good football. #mufc 1-0 down but a long way to go yet and they've had chances #topflightperformance
